ModMetaData.name: Star Wars Pack Animals
ModMetaData.author: Geoppetto Hosseltoff
ModMetaData.description:
Star Wars Pack Animals
Adds caravan pack animal compatibility for the following animals: Rancor, Nexu, Acklay, Tauntaun, Krayt Dragon, Vulptex, and Wampa.
"But I was going into Tosche Station to pick up some Acklay saddlebags!"
Special thanks to Guytonic, beasstmann, and CountryGrimm for creating and updating the StarWars Animal Collection mod. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2006670799
